registration.page.title: Welcome to Street Football Club!
registration.page.description.2: Here is your best destination for finding players, creating teams, planning games and more! We believes in the passion, joy and sense of community that football brings.
registration.page.username-email.validat: User name or email is required.

Could not check if value already exist.
registration.page.password.validation.pa: Password must have at least 6 characters, one non alphanumeric character, one digit ('0'-'9'), one uppercase ('A'-'Z'), one lowercase ('a'-'z').
registration.page.confirm-password.label: Confirm password
